query:
SELECT id, inspectionId, nozzleNumber, nozzleDescription, nominalSize, actualThickness, minRequiredThickness 
FROM nozzleEvaluations 
WHERE inspectionId = (SELECT id FROM inspections WHERE vesselTag = '57-11-001')
ORDER BY nozzleNumber;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2vRv1t5JdAedAFZ.807c3fab4c80 --database A4XPjAmiHcgmrps2ZTa96H --execute SELECT id, inspectionId, nozzleNumber, nozzleDescription, nominalSize, actualThickness, minRequiredThickness 
FROM nozzleEvaluations 
WHERE inspectionId = (SELECT id FROM inspections WHERE vesselTag = '57-11-001')
ORDER BY nozzleNumber;
